Text: Draft Opinion attachedattached is a draft of our opinion I am still waiting to hear from my contact at MARTA so this subject to revision Please send me the SWAP documentation at your earliest convenience Thanks LGDOC Confidentiality Notice This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message LGDOC

RE legal opiniongot your message I did speak to my contact earlier this week and got comfortable about Martas authorization of the swap but I didnt inquire as to legal counselopinions for other similar transactions I hoped our opinion would be acceptable I just left her a message asking her that Her name is Thay pronounced Tie Bishop She is the Treasurer Feel free to call her directly if necessary Original Message From mailto Sent Friday May PM To Subject legal opinion Mae Charles Attached is the form of legal opinion which Enron North America Corp ENA submitted to MARTA together with ENAs draft ISDA Schedule and Paragraph to the Credit Support Annex As we discussed ENA will now be requesting this opinion from you ENA has prepared and submitted a trade confirmation for the recent financial swap to MARTA Other than this document executed by ENA and awaiting execution by MARTA no instruments have been executed by the parties If you need to see the terms and conditions of the trade please let me know I look forward to speaking with you early next week Regards See attached file MARTAdoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Confidentiality Notice This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message
